Coupling strengths of the nanoparticle-molecule systems. Coupling strengths g for different numbers N of molecules placed 3 Å above the nanoparticle. The symbols denote fitted g values from the data of Fig. 2. The dotted lines mark the ideal theoretical coupling strengths
